mapper.insert: INSERT INTO seller_tb ( seller_id, seller_email, seller_pw, seller_auth, seller_phone, seller_name , seller_appenddate, seller_updatedate) VALUES( #{sellerId}, #{sellerEmail}, #{sellerPw}, #{sellerAuth},#{sellerPhone}, #{sellerName} , #{appendDate}, #{updateDate})

INSERT INTO room_tb( room_no, room_title, room_div, room_content, postcode, address, detail_address, extra_address, room_delete, seller_no) VALUES ( null, #{roomTitle}, #{roomDiv}, #{roomContent}, #{postCode}, #{address}, #{detailAddress}, #{extraAddress}, 0, 2)

INSERT INTO roomoption_tb(roption_title, roption_content, roption_price, roption_delete,room_no) VALUES
(#{options.roomOptionTitle}, #{options.roomOptionContent}, #{options.roomOptionPrice}, 0, #{options.roomNo})
mapper.select: select a.*, IFNULL(cnt, 0) as cnt FROM room_tb a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT room_no, COUNT(*) cnt FROM reservation_tb group by room_no ) b ON a.room_no = b.room_no WHERE seller_no = #{sellerNo};
SELECT a.reservation_no, a.reservation_date, a.start_time, a.end_time, b.member_id FROM reservation_tb a INNER JOIN member_tb b ON a.member_no = b.member_no WHERE a.room_no = #{roomNo};

select a.*, COALESCE(b.roptionimage_no, 0) as roptionimage_no, COALESCE(b.original_name, 'none') as original_name, COALESCE(b.save_name, 'none') as save_name, COALESCE(b.file_size, 0) as file_size, COALESCE(b.file_delete, 'N') as file_delete, COALESCE(b.created_date, '0101-01-01') as created_date FROM roomoption_tb a LEFT JOIN roomoptionimage_tb b ON a.roption_no = b.roption_no WHERE a.room_no = #{roomNo}
